summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the portfolio holdings and transactions for JEEPERS INC for the period of December 1, 2017, to December 31, 2017. It includes information on account values, gains and losses, and various financial activities, highlighting the management of investments and income generated during this timeframe. This document appears to be a financial statement from Pershing LLC, detailing account information, transactions, and disclosures related to securities and investments. It outlines the roles and responsibilities of Pershing as a clearing broker and provides important disclosures regarding arbitration agreements and tax information. The document emphasizes the importance of reviewing account details and understanding the implications of various financial transactions. This document contains financial disclosures and account summaries related to transactions and holdings for a specific period, including details about securities, dividends, and interest income. It outlines the roles of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker and provides important information regarding account management and arbitration agreements. This document contains financial disclosures and account activity for an investment account held at Deutsche Bank, detailing transactions, holdings, and account management information for the period of October 1, 2017, to October 31, 2017. It includes information about securities bought and sold, dividends received, and cash deposits and withdrawals. This document contains financial statements and disclosures from Deutsche Bank regarding the account activities of JEEPERS INC for the period of September 1, 2017, to September 30, 2017. It includes details on securities transactions, dividends, interest income, and account management information, highlighting the financial status and transactions of the account. This document contains financial records from Deutsche Bank detailing portfolio holdings and transactions for the period of August 1, 2017, to August 31, 2017. It includes information on cash, mutual funds, and securities, as well as disclosures regarding the roles and responsibilities of Pershing LLC as the clearing broker. This document contains financial statements and disclosures related to the portfolio holdings of an entity named Jeepers Inc. for the period of July 1, 2017, to July 31, 2017. It details various financial transactions, including cash deposits, withdrawals, and the performance of mutual funds and money market accounts, as well as important disclosures regarding the management of the account. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing portfolio holdings and transactions for a client, identified as Jeepers Inc., for the period of June 1, 2017, to June 30, 2017. It includes information on cash, money market funds, mutual funds, and various transactions, along with disclosures regarding the role of Pershing as the clearing broker. This document appears to be a financial statement from Pershing LLC, detailing account transactions, holdings, and tax information for a portfolio associated with an entity named Jeepers Inc. It includes summaries of gains and losses, cash balances, and investment holdings, as well as disclosures regarding the management of the account and compliance with financial regulations. This document appears to be a financial statement related to an account managed by Pershing LLC for a client named Joshua Shoshan. It details account balances, transactions, and investment holdings for the period of April 1, 2017, to April 30, 2017, including mutual funds and cash management activities. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account information for 'JEEPERS INC' for the period of March 1, 2017, to March 31, 2017. It includes account balances, transaction summaries, and disclosures regarding the roles of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker and other financial details. This document appears to be a financial statement related to an investment account, detailing account information, transactions, and disclosures regarding the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker. It includes information about account values, investment types, and important disclosures regarding arbitration and tax information. This document contains financial disclosures and account summaries related to securities transactions, including details about mutual funds, dividends, and account management. It outlines the role of Pershing as a clearing broker and provides important disclosures regarding investment transactions and arbitration agreements. This document contains financial disclosures and account information related to securities transactions for a client at Deutsche Bank. It outlines various financial activities, including securities bought and sold, dividends received, and important disclosures regarding the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker. The document emphasizes the importance of understanding investment risks and the arbitration agreement between the client and Pershing.
